title: Why does Riot hate OCE?
body:
All I want is the free Unchained Alistar skin so I can get Alistar for free... I've been subscribed to the youtube channel for over a year so why aren't I getting the same rewards as NA, EUW and EUNE? I'm so sad :( 

{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Someone please tell me how to get all 3 skins?

Riot Girl Tristana = Like facebook page of LoL
Dreadknight Garen = Follow twitter account of LoL
Unchained Alistar = Contact support
Hmm I got trristana and garen but Alistair? Seems that tthey don't do it for oce?
You can't get Unchained Alistar through the normal method, which is subscribing to the youtube channel, but if you contact support they should be willing to add it manually.
Does it work? Because on their website it says only certain servers can receive it. Oce was not one of them.
It does. I've got Unchained Alistar on multiple accounts, all from contacting support.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=3nqUXKEp,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2015-06-08T05:01:33.962+0000)
>
> It does. I've got Unchained Alistar on multiple accounts, all from contacting support.

Thanks! :) I'll go do that
Unchained looks so ugly though. Not even badass.

> [{quoted}](name=kJs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=3nqUXKEp,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-06-09T02:24:24.661+0000)
>
> Unchained looks so ugly though. Not even badass.

Yeah but I still want the free Alistar instead of spending my precious ip.
Meanwhile I am still waiting for my Unchained Alistar and Rito Grill Tris from like 4 years ago.
I mailed a ticket and got dreadknight garen, unchained alistar, and riot tristana.

Because we are strong af we live in the heat almost every day (unless its july) we have spiders coming to kill us and snakes and shit and we survive every day. They so jelly that we are just so much awesome than them americans that scream when they see a daddy long legs
